fields.name: Aluminium Teapot
fields.description: This teapot is both robust and stylish. Don't go camping without a plan for your morning cup of tea!

fields.name: Thermal Food Carrier
fields.description: Don't go camping without this thermal food carrier to keep all your food and drink fresh and cool.
fields.overview: Keep your food and drink cool while camping!

fields.name: Travel Kitchen Set
fields.description: This travel cutlery set includes everything that you might need to eat well at a campsite - that is, aside from food! Plates, cutlery, and a handy container to carry them in.
fields.overview: All you need to eat well at a campsite.

fields.name: Water Purifier
fields.description: Don't go camping without a water purifier to hand. This invaluable gadget ensures allows you to turn found water sources into clean, drinkable water. Furthermore, at only 300g, it won't weigh you down on the longest treks.

fields.name: Carbiner Clips
fields.description: Carbiner clips have a myriad of uses around the campsite - holding things down, holding things together, and helping pack things away. Any wise camper won't hit the trail without two or three in their pack.

fields.name: Foldable Cutlery
fields.description: Never be caught eating with your hands again - this handy and lightweight cutlery set fits into even the tightest backpack and ensures that you have a little bit of home comfort while on the trail.

fields.name: Tactical Hunting Bag
fields.description:
This canvas hunting bag helps keep your tools and equipment organised while away on a hunting trip. Includes compartments for several tools, webbing straps to keep them in place, and a lightweight structure.

PICTURED CONTENTS NOT INCLUDED!
fields.overview: Keep your tools and equipment organised!

fields.name: Credit Card Multitool
fields.description: This credit-card sized multitool makes a perfect gift for the urban explorer. Small enough to fit in your wallet, but equipped with the essential tools to help you out of all manner of tricky situations.
fields.overview: The perfect gift for urban explorers.

fields.name: Camping Stove
fields.description: This portable camping stove is easy to carry and powerful enough to happily cook your a main meal.

fields.name: Gas Torch
fields.description: Although the obvious use for such a torch is in cooking, the truth is instant fire has many uses in a survival situation - a quick light, starting a fire, and signalling, to name a few.
fields.overview: A gas torch has many uses.

fields.name: Camping Pillow
fields.description: This pillow deflates and fits conveniently in your backpack - then when you need it, just give it a bit of air!

fields.name: Parachute Cord
fields.description: An essential item in any backpackers arsenal. Use it to hold up tents, tie down belongings, tie up rafts - really, the uses are endless. 25 meter lengths and 100% nylon construction.
fields.overview: An essential item in any backpackers arsenal.

fields.name: Torch
fields.description: A torch is an essential tool on all camping trips. This convenient Police branded torch will ensure you can set camp at night, find your supplies, and respond to any evening situation.
fields.overview: A must have on all camping trips.

fields.name: Mini Torch
fields.description: Never worry about finding your torch in the dark again - this mini torch attaches to a keychain or a belt loop, ensuring that is always to hand.

fields.name: Camp Lantern
fields.description: Illuminate your entire campsite with this small yet powerful lantern. With effective lighting, you can be sure to enjoy more activities into the evening.

fields.name: Mini Spotlight
fields.description: Sometimes you need a small light that you can stand against a tree and focus on something - step in the mini spotlight. With this little tool, you can have your hands free for tent pitching, fire building, and anything else you need to do.

fields.name: Walking Stick
fields.description: Walking sticks are great accessories for hiking comfort - they allow a hiker to distribute the stress and impact of a tough walk, which means they can walk further and find more adventure!
fields.overview: A great accessory for hiking comfort.

fields.name: Military Compass
fields.description: This military grade compass kit is the perfect kit for a budding navigator. Never get lost again!

fields.name: Freeze Dried Fruits
fields.description: Forget unhealthy refined sugars in your snacks - our freeze dried fruit collections will satisfy your hunger, while giving you the energy you need to go further, harder, and to experience more!
